Detailed Description

contains the data associated with the aperture and performance evaluation.

Field Documentation

LOC_T* APER_T::locs

PLOCS in laos.

the fine sampled grid on aperture for peformance evaluation.

LOCSTAT_T* APER_T::locs_stat

record the starting location of each column in locs, used to accelerate accphi

double* APER_T::amp

amplitude map defined on locs, if exists.

sum to 1. for performance evaluation

amplitude map defined o locs, maximum is 1.

The input amplitude map on ground level read from file.
